fields.content:
Dear Colleague,

Trip {{number}} has been {{state}} for {{owner_name}} here:

{{url}}

Thank you.
fields.name: trips/trip/created/updated
fields.description: The email that is send to the supervisor, budget owner, traveller for any update
fields.subject: Trip {{number}} has been {{state}} for {{owner_name}}

fields.name: registration/profile/created
fields.subject: New Registration at: {{domain}}

fields.content:
Dear {{owner_name}},

Your account has been activated and you can log in here:

http://{{ domain }}

Thank you.
fields.name: registration/profile/activated
fields.subject: Your account has been activated for: {{domain}}

fields.name: trips/trip/TA_request
fields.description: This email is to be sent to the relevant programme assistant to create the TA for the staff in concern after the approval of the supervisor.
fields.subject: Travel Authorization request for {{owner_name}}

fields.content:
Dear {{travel_assistant}},

Please organise the travel for {{owner_name}} and request security clearance as per this approved travel request:

{{url}}

Thanks
fields.name: travel/trip/travel_or_admin_assistant
fields.description: This is the e-mail that will be generated when the trip is approved by the supervisor. It will go to the travel assistant (for Beirut based staff) and the Admin Assitant from the relevant field office for field based staff to prompt them to organise the travel (vehicles, flights etc.) and request security clearance.
fields.subject: Travel for {{owner_name}}

fields.name: trips/trip/approved
fields.description: The email that is sent to the traveller if a trip has been approved
fields.subject: Trip Approved: {{trip_reference}}

fields.name: trips/action/created
fields.description: Sent when trip action points are created
fields.subject: Trip action point created for trip: {{trip_reference}}

fields.name: trips/action/closed
fields.description: Sent when trip action points are closed
fields.subject: Trip action point closed for trip: {{trip_reference}}

fields.name: trips/trip/TA_drafted
fields.description: This email is sent to the relevant colleague to approve the TA for the staff in concern after the TA has been drafted in VISION.
fields.subject: Travel Authorization drafted for {{owner_name}}

fields.name: trips/trip/cancelled
fields.description: The email that is sent to everyone if a trip has been cancelled
fields.subject: Trip Cancelled: {{trip_reference}}
